description:
This course will empower you with the skills needed to set up and install a WordPress blog.

By the end of this course you will have a complete blog with a slider and a custom configured theme.

We go through the complete set up and installation process. Finishing with a responsive functional WordPress website!

You will learn how to:

  • Install WordPress
  • Install Themes
  • Customise Themes
  • Install Widgets
  • Install Plugins
title: WordPress Beginner: A Complete Blog
